text: The Canaan Motor Club (CMC) is a race track in Canaan, New Hampshire, in the United States. The CMC is a technically challenging road course with extensive runoff areas to promote a safe environment for all track users. The track may be run in both directions to give a total of with nine major turns. The track may be configured to run two separate events at the same time. ==External links== *Official website Category:Buildings and structures in Grafton County, New Hampshire Category:Canaan, New Hampshire Category:Motorsport venues in New Hampshire Category:Tourist attractions in Grafton County, New Hampshire
title: Canaan Motor Club
